name: Fourth knight
description:
Good afternoon, my name is Denis and i create games. I'm solo working on projects for now. I am glad to present you my new project, which is still under development.Its top-down action game with souls-like elements.

I plan to finalize the game and release it in 2-3 months.

Сontrol:
Left mouse -attack
Right mouse - block and parry
E - use object
Q - target enemy
Space - dash
tab - inventory
escape - quit game
BAR 
Red bar - hp
Green bar - stamina(attack/block)
Blue bar - poise

Gameplay video.

Bossfight.

Hub location.

A little about future plans 

1) new locations

2) shop

3) new weapons

4) power-ups and character leveling

5) simple and pleasant plot

6) bosses

7) advanced ai

I'm making the game by myself, I don't have a permanent job, so I'll be glad for any support. I'm interested in an opinion about your project, what can be improved to add or increase. Send feedback :)

Thank you for your attention, contact me by maill - 13371337ddd@gmail.com
